Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BangBangController  
    CaptureFlag
    This class is the main one and interacts with the other classes to perform the localization, navigation and zipline traversal.
    LightLocalizer
    The light localization uses the color sensor to know where the robot is from the origin.
    LightSensor
    This class is used to get the color of the bricks for flag recognition.
    Navigation
    This class takes care of the robot navigation.
    Odometer
    The odometer takes care of updating the values for X, Y and Theta based on the wheel motors tacho count.
    OdometryDisplay
    Displays the values that the odometer updates.
    UltrasonicLocalizer
    This class uses the ultrasonic sensor as well as falling / rising edge routine to know what is the 0 degrees direction.
    UltrasonicPoller
    Control of the wall follower is applied periodically by the UltrasonicPoller thread.
